current_event.event_s: You find yourself in the town of Vicentther. What do you want to do?
action_s: Visit the Temple of the Jumbo Prom
Visit the School for Bleached Retinas
result_s: You leave the town. There's not much to do here anyway.
You start making your way towards The Morose Mart. Maybe you'll be able to find some decent conversation.
You start heading towards Aphrodisius's Fabled Rants. You've got some spare cash on hand, so why not splurge a bit?
As you start heading towards the Temple of the Jumbo Prom, you start wondering if you might burst into flames upon entering. Hopefully not.

You've always been passionate about learning, so heading to the School for Bleached Retinas would be enjoyable.

Just kidding. You might be able to learn some sick kung-fu skills if you go though, so why not.

previous_event.event_s:
You wake up on a riverbank.

Hacking up water, your lungs feel like they're on fire, but apart from the near-drowning, you're at least alive.

You roll over, exhausted, when you notice a Mysterious Figure crouching in front of you.
previous_event.result_s:
The Mysterious Figure stands up and walks into the nearby woods.

You aren't in too great a shape, and can't follow them. After lying down for a while, you get up and try to find your way to the nearest town.

At least you ended up on the other side of the river.
